Vision Training: People could undergo vision training to improve their visual perception and compensate for their poor vision. This could include techniques like eye exercises, color therapy, or other vision enhancement methods.

Smart Technology: Develop wearable technology such as smart glasses or contactless augmented reality (AR) glasses that can enhance vision through real-time image processing and superimposition of visual information.
Alternative Text: In the absence of glasses and contact lenses, websites and digital content could be designed with alternative text or alt text to assist visually impaired users.
Braille and Audio: Books and documents could be printed in Braille or made available in audio format to help people with poor vision read and understand written content.
Voice-activated interfaces: Develop voice-activated interfaces for devices and applications that could assist visually impaired users in navigating and using technology.
